txt.en: Thank you for contributing your collection! Please place your items in the box to receive your reward.
Wanted: Toughened carapaces from the snow-lurkers throughout the Bruinen Source. \n\nThe dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of toughened carapaces.
You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.

'Strange beasts lurk in these mountains. The strangest are long-limbed creatures that look like snow piles. The Elves tell us that they are wild creatures of nature. I have told them that I would do what I could to help them heal these creatures. I need their carapaces and heartwood to learn more about them.'
The dwarves of the Misty Mountains have requested a collection of toughened carapaces.
Deliver the toughened carapaces to Larus Sharpshard at Gl√≥in's Camp in the Misty Mountains
Collection boxes for this task can be found at the camps within the Misty Mountains.\n\nYou should bring the trophies you gathered to a collection box.
Wanted: Toughened carapaces from the snow-lurkers throughout the Bruinen Source.
Collect toughened carapaces and drop them in a collection box ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
